description: Versatile, comfortable hiking shorts made of 95% nylon (65% recycled)/5% spandex stretch fabric that provides 40+ UPF sun protection. Inseam is 10 in; also available in 8 in inseam.
name: Patagonia Quandary Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 4.2-oz 95% nylon (65% recycled), 5% spandex with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish and 40+ UPF sun protection
